name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven professional with over 10 years of experience in full stack development, now leveraging extensive expertise in **Python** to transition into a Senior Firewall Engineer role. Highly skilled in delivering high-performance software solutions, with a strong focus on security compliance and risk management. Demonstrated proficiency in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Proven track record in building secure, maintainable solutions with compliance to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. 
Expertise in cloud environments, specifically **Azure** and **AWS**, along with substantial experience in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation. Additionally, brings practical experience in MLOps, having developed ML pipelines and managed production workflows. Passionate about integrating innovative technologies to drive impactful security solutions.
